nodes.text: This crate's already been opened. I'll have to lift the lid off if I want to see what's inside.
That's an item just came in. I ain't priced it yet.
You'll never guess what's in it, in a million years.
Is it a wheel of cheddar?
We don't have much call for that.
Could it be a tea kettle?
Is it some sort of a large root vegetable?
Is it something made out of terra cotta?
Is it a terra cotta pot?
Is it a terra cotta urn?
Is it a terra cotta... monkey?
Is it a terra cotta vase?
I can't think of anything else made out of terra cotta.
I never said it was made outta terra cotta. I just asked you ta be more specific.
Is it something made out of precious metal?
Is it a deck of cards?
No. Not this time of year.
Is it a hammer and chisel?
Is it a coat of arms?
That's a shame. I could play this game all day with ya. I gots nothing else ta do.
I've got better things to do than to stand around all day guessing what's in this crate.
I'll have ta take yer word for that.
It's just a terra cotta gorilla. It's not nearly as interesting as I hoped it would be.
But... but you said it wasn't a terra cotta monkey!
A gorilla ain't a monkey! Everyone knows that!
It's just a terra cotta gorilla... after all that.
